Queries.GetInvoices:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A."DocNum" ASC) AS '#', CASE A."U_BO_S" WHEN '0' THEN 'A la espera' WHEN '1' THEN 'Aceptada' WHEN '2' THEN 'Rechaza' WHEN '3' THEN 'En validación' ELSE 'A la espera' END AS 'Estado', A."DocNum" AS 'No_Factura', A."CardCode" AS 'Codigo_cliente', A."CardName" AS 'Nombre_cliente', A."DocDate" AS 'Fecha_Documento', A."DocDueDate" AS 'Fecha_vencimiento', CASE WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'Y' THEN 'SI' WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'N' THEN 'NO' ELSE '' END AS 'Enviar_Email', CASE WHEN B.U_BO_StatusEmail = '200' THEN 'Enviado' ELSE 'Pendiente' END AS 'Estado_Correo', B.U_BO_Email1 AS 'Correo1', B.U_BO_Email2 AS 'Correo2', B.U_BO_Email3 AS 'Correo3', B.U_BO_Email4 AS 'Correo4', B.U_BO_Email5 AS 'Correo5', A."DocTotal" AS 'Total_documento', CASE WHEN A."U_BO_MRWS" IS NULL THEN 'No Enviado' ELSE A."U_BO_MRWS" END AS "Respuesta_TFHKA", A."DocEntry" AS 'DocEntry', C."SeriesName" AS "SeriesName", A."U_BO_CUFE" AS "CUFE", A."CreateDate" AS "FechaCreacion", CASE WHEN LEN(A."DocTime") = 3 THEN CONCAT(LEFT(A."DocTime",1) , ':' , RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) ELSE CONCAT(LEFT(A."DocTime",2) , ':' , RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) END "Hora_Creacion", A."U_BO_FHAD" AS "FHAD", 'Ver XML' AS "XML", 'Ver PDF' AS "PDF", D."PymntGroup" AS "Condicion_Pago"
FROM "OINV" A LEFT JOIN "@BOEE" B ON A."DocEntry"=B."U_BO_DocEntry" AND B."U_BO_ObjecType" = '13' LEFT JOIN "NNM1" C ON A."Series"=C."Series" AND C."ObjectCode" = '13' LEFT JOIN "OCTG" D ON A."GroupNum"=D."GroupNum"
WHERE A."DocDate" BETWEEN '%FI%' AND '%FF%' %EstadoDocumento% AND A."Series" in (%Series%) AND A."DocSubType"= '--' ***SN*** ***DocNum***
Queries.GetCreditMemo:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A."DocNum" ASC) AS '#', CASE A."U_BO_S" WHEN '0' THEN 'A la espera' WHEN '1' THEN 'Aceptada' WHEN '2' THEN 'Rechaza' WHEN '3' THEN 'En validación' ELSE 'A la espera' END AS 'Estado', A."DocNum" AS 'No_Factura', A."CardCode" AS 'Codigo_cliente', A."CardName" AS 'Nombre_cliente', A."DocDate" AS 'Fecha_Documento', A."DocDueDate" AS 'Fecha_vencimiento', CASE WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'Y' THEN 'SI' WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'N' THEN 'NO' ELSE '' END AS 'Enviar_Email', CASE WHEN B.U_BO_StatusEmail = '200' THEN 'Enviado' ELSE 'Pendiente' END AS 'Estado_Correo', B.U_BO_Email1 AS 'Correo1', B.U_BO_Email2 AS 'Correo2', B.U_BO_Email3 AS 'Correo3', B.U_BO_Email4 AS 'Correo4', B.U_BO_Email5 AS 'Correo5', A."DocTotal" AS 'Total_documento', CASE WHEN A."U_BO_MRWS" IS NULL THEN 'No Enviado' ELSE A."U_BO_MRWS" END AS "Respuesta_TFHKA", A."DocEntry" AS 'DocEntry', C."SeriesName" AS "SeriesName", A."U_BO_CUFE" AS "CUFE", A."CreateDate" AS "FechaCreacion", CASE WHEN LEN(A."DocTime") = 3 THEN CONCAT(LEFT(A."DocTime",1) , ':' , RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) ELSE CONCAT(LEFT(A."DocTime",2) , ':' , RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) END "Hora_Creacion", A."U_BO_FHAD" AS "FHAD", 'Ver XML' AS "XML", 'Ver PDF' AS "PDF", D."PymntGroup" AS "Condicion_Pago"
FROM "ORIN" A LEFT JOIN "@BOEE" B ON A."DocEntry"=B."U_BO_DocEntry" AND B."U_BO_ObjecType" = '14' LEFT JOIN "NNM1" C ON A."Series"=C."Series" AND C."ObjectCode" = '13' LEFT JOIN "OCTG" D ON A."GroupNum"=D."GroupNum"
WHERE A."DocDate" BETWEEN '%FI%' AND '%FF%' %EstadoDocumento% AND A."Series" in (%Series%) ***SN*** ***DocNum***
Queries.GetDebitMemo:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A."DocNum" ASC) AS '#', CASE "U_BO_S" WHEN '0' THEN 'A la espera' WHEN '1' THEN 'Aceptada' WHEN '2' THEN 'Rechaza' WHEN '3' THEN 'En validación' ELSE 'A la espera' END AS 'Estado', A."DocNum" AS 'No_Factura', A."CardCode" AS 'Codigo_cliente', A."CardName" AS 'Nombre_cliente', A."DocDate" AS 'Fecha_Documento', A."DocDueDate" AS 'Fecha_vencimiento', CASE WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'Y' THEN 'SI' WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'N' THEN 'NO' ELSE '' END AS 'Enviar_Email', CASE WHEN B.U_BO_StatusEmail = '200' THEN 'Enviado' ELSE 'Pendiente' END AS 'Estado_Correo', B.U_BO_Email1 AS 'Correo1', B.U_BO_Email2 AS 'Correo2', B.U_BO_Email3 AS 'Correo3', B.U_BO_Email4 AS 'Correo4', B.U_BO_Email5 AS 'Correo5', A."DocTotal" AS 'Total_documento', CASE WHEN A."U_BO_MRWS" IS NULL THEN 'No Enviado' ELSE A."U_BO_MRWS" END AS "Respuesta_TFHKA", A."DocEntry" AS 'DocEntry', C."SeriesName" AS "SeriesName", A."U_BO_CUFE" AS "CUFE", A."CreateDate" AS "FechaCreacion", CASE WHEN LEN(A."DocTime") = 3 THEN CONCAT(LEFT(A."DocTime",1) , ':' , RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) ELSE CONCAT(LEFT(A."DocTime",2) , ':' , RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) END "Hora_Creacion", A."U_BO_FHAD" AS "FHAD", 'Ver XML' AS "XML", 'Ver PDF' AS "PDF", D."PymntGroup" AS "Condicion_Pago"
FROM "OINV" A LEFT JOIN "@BOEE" B ON A."DocEntry"=B."U_BO_DocEntry" AND B."U_BO_ObjecType" = '13' LEFT JOIN "NNM1" C ON A."Series"=C."Series" AND C."ObjectCode" = '13' LEFT JOIN "OCTG" D ON A."GroupNum"=D."GroupNum" WHERE A."DocDate" BETWEEN '%FI%' AND '%FF%' %EstadoDocumento% AND A."DocSubType" = 'DN' AND A."Series" in (%Series%) ***SN*** ***DocNum***
Queries.GetPurchase:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A."DocNum" ASC) AS '#', CASE A."U_BO_S" WHEN '0' THEN 'A la espera' WHEN '1' THEN 'Aceptada' WHEN '2' THEN 'Rechaza' WHEN '3' THEN 'En validación' ELSE 'A la espera' END AS 'Estado', A."DocNum" AS 'No_Factura', A."CardCode" AS 'Codigo_cliente', A."CardName" AS 'Nombre_cliente', A."DocDate" AS 'Fecha_Documento', A."DocDueDate" AS 'Fecha_vencimiento', CASE WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'Y' THEN 'SI' WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'N' THEN 'NO' ELSE '' END AS 'Enviar_Email', CASE WHEN B.U_BO_StatusEmail = '200' THEN 'Enviado' ELSE 'Pendiente' END AS 'Estado_Correo', B.U_BO_Email1 AS 'Correo1', B.U_BO_Email2 AS 'Correo2', B.U_BO_Email3 AS 'Correo3', B.U_BO_Email4 AS 'Correo4', B.U_BO_Email5 AS 'Correo5', A."DocTotal" AS 'Total_documento', CASE WHEN A."U_BO_MRWS" IS NULL THEN 'No Enviado' ELSE A."U_BO_MRWS" END AS "Respuesta_TFHKA", A."DocEntry" AS 'DocEntry', C."SeriesName" AS "SeriesName", A."U_BO_CUFE" AS "CUFE", A."CreateDate" AS "FechaCreacion", CASE WHEN LEN(A."DocTime") = 3 THEN CONCAT(LEFT(A."DocTime",1) , ':' , RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) ELSE CONCAT(LEFT(A."DocTime",2) , ':' , RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) END "Hora_Creacion", A."U_BO_FHAD" AS "FHAD", 'Ver XML' AS "XML", 'Ver PDF' AS "PDF", D."PymntGroup" AS "Condicion_Pago"
FROM OPCH A LEFT JOIN "@BOEE" B ON A."DocEntry"=B."U_BO_DocEntry" AND B."U_BO_ObjecType" = '18' LEFT JOIN "NNM1" C ON A."Series"=C."Series" AND C."ObjectCode" = '13' LEFT JOIN "OCTG" D ON A."GroupNum"=D."GroupNum" WHERE A."DocDate" BETWEEN '%FI%' AND '%FF%' %EstadoDocumento% AND A."Series" in (%Series%) AND A."DocSubType"= '--' ***SN*** ***DocNum***
Queries.GetSeriesNumberInvoice: SELECT "Series" AS 'Series', "SeriesName" 'Nombre', "ObjectCode" FROM NNM1 WHERE "ObjectCode" = '13' AND "DocSubType" = '--'
Queries.GetSeriesNumberCreditMemo: SELECT "Series" AS 'Series', "SeriesName" 'Nombre', "ObjectCode" FROM NNM1 WHERE "ObjectCode" = '14' AND "DocSubType" = '--'
Queries.GetSeriesNumberDebitMemo: SELECT "Series" AS 'Series', "SeriesName" 'Nombre', "ObjectCode" FROM NNM1 WHERE "ObjectCode" = '13' AND "DocSubType" = 'DN'
Queries.GetSeriesNumberActive: select Stuff((SELECT CAST(',' AS varchar(MAX)) + convert(varchar, Code) from [@BOSERNUM] WHERE U_BO_TD = 'FVC' FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') AS 'SNFV', Stuff((SELECT CAST(',' AS varchar(MAX)) + convert(varchar, Code) from [@BOSERNUM] WHERE U_BO_TD = 'NCC' FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') AS 'SNNC', Stuff((SELECT CAST(',' AS varchar(MAX)) + convert(varchar, Code) from [@BOSERNUM] WHERE U_BO_TD = 'NDC' FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') AS 'SNND', Stuff((SELECT CAST(',' AS varchar(MAX)) + convert(varchar, Code) from [@BOSERNUM] WHERE U_BO_TD = 'DSA' FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') AS 'DSA'
Queries.GetTiposOperacion: SELECT T0."FldValue" AS 'Valor', T0."Descr" AS 'Descripcion' FROM UFD1 T0 WHERE "TableID" = '@BOEBILLINGP' AND "FieldID" IN (SELECT TOP 1 "FieldID" FROM CUFD WHERE AliasID = 'BO_TO') AND T0.Descr IN ('Estandar','Servicios AIU','Mandatos bienes')
Queries.GetCategoryeBilling: SELECT MAX("IntrnalKey") AS 'IntrnalKey' FROM OUQR WHERE "QName" = '%NombreQuery%' AND "QCategory"='%CategoryID%'
Queries.GetIntrnalKeySearchFormatted: SELECT MAX(IntrnalKey) AS IntrnalKey FROM OUQR WHERE QCategory = '%CategoryID%' AND QName = '%NameSearchFormatted%'
Queries.FormattedSearchActividadEconomicaHCO: SELECT T1.[Code], T1.[Name] FROM [dbo].[@HCO_RP0007] T1 ORDER BY 1
Queries.FormattedSearchActividadEconomicaOK1: SELECT T0."Code", T0."U_desc" FROM "@BPCO_MM_ACECO" T0 ORDER BY T0.Code
Queries.FormattedSearchActividadEconomicaEXX: SELECT T0."Code", T0."U_desc" FROM "@BPCO_MM_ACECO" T0 ORDER BY T0.Code
Queries.FormattedSearchActividadEconomicaBO: SELECT T0."Code", T0."U_BO_Descrip" FROM "@BO_ACTECONOM" T0 ORDER BY T0.Code
Queries.FormattedSearchUnidadesMedidaEstandar: SELECT DISTINCT "SalUnitMsr" AS "Unidad de Medida Estandar" FROM "OITM" ORDER BY 1
Queries.FormattedSearchFacturasdeVenta: SELECT "DocNum" AS 'No. Factura', "DocDate" AS 'Fecha Contabilizacion', "CardCode" AS 'Codigo Cliente', "CardName" AS 'Nombre del Cliente', "DocTotal" AS 'Total Documento' FROM "OINV" ORDER BY 1,2
Queries.FormattedSearchSeriesNumeracion: SELECT "Series", "SeriesName", "InitialNum", "LastNum", "Remark" FROM NNM1 WHERE ObjectCode IN ('13','14','18')
Queries.GetFormmatedSearchKey: SELECT TOP 1 ISNULL("IndexID",0) FROM CSHS WHERE "FormID" = '%FormID%' AND "ItemID" = '%ItemID%'
Queries.GetDocEntryAndParameters:
SELECT TOP 1 T0."DocEntry", T0."Series", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_L" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "Localizacion", T0."U_BO_CRWS" AS "CRWS", COALESCE((SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_FormE" FROM [@BOEBILLINGP]),0) AS "FormaEnvio", COALESCE((SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_FEDS" FROM [@BOEBILLINGP]),0) AS "FormaEnvioDS", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "Llave", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "Password", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_UserDB" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "UserDB", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PassDB" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "PassDB", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_RutaPDF" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A.U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "RutaPDF", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_RutaXML" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "RutaXML", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_RutaCRL" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A.U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "RutaCR", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_GXP" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A.U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "GeneraXMLP", T1."U_BO_PREF" AS "PrefijoDes"
FROM "%Tabla%" T0 LEFT JOIN "@BOSERNUM" T1 ON T0."Series"=T1."Code" WHERE T0."DocNum" = '%sDocNumInvoice%' AND T0."Series" = '%sSerieNumeracion%' AND T0."DocSubType" = '%DocSubType%'
Queries.GetDocEntryAndParametersService:
SELECT TOP 1 T0."DocEntry", T0."DocNum", T0."Series", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_L" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "Localizacion", T0."U_BO_CRWS" AS "CRWS", COALESCE((SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_FormE" FROM [@BOEBILLINGP]),0) AS "FormaEnvio", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "Llave", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "Password", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_UserDB" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "UserDB", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PassDB" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "PassDB", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_RutaPDF" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaPDF", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_RutaXML" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "RutaXML", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_RutaCRL" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaCR", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_GXP" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "GeneraXMLP", T1."U_BO_PREF" AS "PrefijoDes"
FROM "%Tabla%" T0 LEFT JOIN "@BOSERNUM" T1 ON T0."Series"=T1."Code" WHERE T0."DocEntry" = '%sDocEntry%'
Queries.GetParameterstoSend: SELECT TOP 1 "XmlPath" AS 'XmlPath', (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM [@BOEBILLINGP] WHERE "U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS 'TokenEmpresa', (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM [@BOEBILLINGP] WHERE "U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS 'TokenPassword' FROM "OADM"
Queries.GetRPTDoc: SELECT T0."CODE" AS "TipoDoc", T0."DEFLT_REP" AS "ID_Layout", T1."DocName" AS "NombreFormato", (SELECT TOP 1 A.U_BO_RutaCRL FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaPDFyXML" FROM "RTYP" T0 LEFT JOIN "RDOC" T1 ON T0."DEFLT_REP" ="DocCode" WHERE T0.CODE = '%TypeDoc%'
Queries.GetRPTDocUser: SELECT TOP 1 "DoumntDode" AS "TipoDoc", T0.DfltReport AS "ID_Layout", T1.DocName AS "NombreFormato", (SELECT TOP 1 A.U_BO_RutaCRL FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaPDFyXML" FROM "RDFL" T0 INNER JOIN "RDOC" T1 ON T0."DfltReport" = T1.DocCode WHERE DoumntDode = '%TypeDoc%' AND T0.UserId = '%UserId%'
Queries.GetCUFEInvoice:
SELECT U_BO_CUFE AS 'CUFE', CASE WHEN "U_BO_Pref" = 'Y' THEN CONCAT(T2."BeginStr",CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(50))) ELSE CAST(T0."DocNum" as NVARCHAR(50)) END AS "consecutivoDocumento", FORMAT (T0."DocDate", 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS 'fechaEmision'
FROM OINV T0 LEFT JOIN [@BOSERNUM] T1 ON T0."Series"=T1."Code" LEFT JOIN "NNM1" T2 ON T0."Series"=T2."Series" AND T2."ObjectCode" = '13'
WHERE T0.DocNum = '%DocNum%'
Queries.GetCUFEDebitNote:
SELECT U_BO_CUFE AS 'CUFE',
CASE WHEN "U_BO_Pref" = 'Y' THEN CONCAT(T2."BeginStr",CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(50))) ELSE CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(50)) END AS "consecutivoDocumento",
FORMAT (T0."DocDate", 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS 'fechaEmision'
FROM OINV T0 LEFT JOIN [@BOSERNUM] T1 ON T0."Series"=T1."Code" LEFT JOIN "NNM1" T2 ON T0."Series"=T2."Series" AND T2."ObjectCode" = '13'
WHERE T0.DocNum = '%DocNum%' AND T0.Series = T0."DocSubType" = 'DN'
Queries.GetInvoiceandPrefijo: SELECT TOP 1 CONCAT(T1.BeginStr,CAST(T0.DocNum AS NVARCHAR(20))) AS 'PrefWithDoc', (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "TokenEmpresa", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "TokenPassword" FROM "OINV" T0 LEFT JOIN "NNM1" T1 ON T0."Series"=T1."Series" AND T1."ObjectCode" = '13' WHERE T0.DocNum = '%NoDoc%' AND T0.DocSubType != 'DN'
Queries.GetModoandURL: SELECT TOP 1 CASE WHEN U_BO_Mdo = 'PRU' THEN U_BO_URLWSPRU ELSE U_BO_URLWSPRD END AS 'URLTFHKA', U_BO_Mdo AS 'Modo', U_BO_MI AS 'ModoIntegracion', U_BO_PC AS 'ProtocoloComunicacion' FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE %Estado% %DocEntry%
Queries.CFLSN: SELECT TOP 1 ISNULL(CardCode,'') FROM OCRD WHERE CardCode = '%CardCode%'
Queries.DecimalQuantity: SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END AS "CantidadDecimales" FROM "OCRN" B WHERE B."CurrCode" = (SELECT "MainCurncy" FROM "OADM")
Queries.GetPrefijoSeries: SELECT U_BO_PREF AS 'Prefijo' FROM [@BOSERNUM] WHERE Code = '%Code%'
Queries.GetLlaveAndPassword: SELECT (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "Llave", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "Password"
Queries.PathFilesAttchment: SELECT CONCAT(trgtPath,'\', FileName" , '.' , "FileExt") AS "PathFile" FROM ATC1 WHERE "AbsEntry" = '%DocEntryAdjuntos%'
Queries.CheckDigitCalculation:
CREATE FUNCTION BO_CheckDigitCalculation ( @NIT nvarchar(50) )
RETURNS int AS BEGIN
DECLARE @CantidadDigitos INT DECLARE @Contador INT DECLARE @NITFinal NVARCHAR(50) DECLARE @DigitoVerificacionHallado INT
SET @NITFinal = (SELECT RIGHT('000000000000000' + Ltrim(Rtrim(@NIT)),15)) SET @CantidadDigitos = LEN(@NITFinal) SET @Contador = 0
if (@CantidadDigitos >= 16 ) -- starts with begin return 00 end else -- contains, but doesn't start with begin
DECLARE @Suma INT DECLARE @SumaDivision DECIMAL(19,8) DECLARE @SumaDivisionRedondeado INT DECLARE @DecimalesHallados FLOAT DECLARE @Residuo INT
DECLARE @Specification TABLE( ID INT, Valor INT, ValorDIAN INT )
INSERT INTO @Specification(ID,Valor, ValorDIAN )VALUES(1, (SUBSTRING(@NITFinal, 1, 1)),71) INSERT INTO @Specification(ID,Valor, ValorDIAN )VALUES(2, (SUBSTRING(@NITFinal, 2, 1)),67) INSERT INTO @Specification(ID,Valor, ValorDIAN )VALUES(3, (SUBSTRING(@NITFinal, 3, 1)),59) INSERT INTO @Specification(ID,Valor, ValorDIAN )VALUES(4, (SUBSTRING(@NITFinal, 4, 1)),53) INSERT INTO @Specification(ID,Valor, ValorDIAN )VALUES(5, (SUBSTRING(@NITFinal, 5, 1)),47) INSERT INTO @Specification(ID,Valor, ValorDIAN )VALUES(6, (SUBSTRING(@NITFinal, 6, 1)),43) INSERT INTO @Specification(ID,Valor, ValorDIAN )VALUES(7, (SUBSTRING(@NITFinal, 7, 1)),41) INSERT INTO @Specification(ID,Valor, ValorDIAN )VALUES(8, (SUBSTRING(@NITFinal, 8, 1)),37) INSERT INTO @Specification(ID,Valor, ValorDIAN )VALUES(9, (SUBSTRING(@NITFinal, 9, 1)),29) INSERT INTO @Specification(ID,Valor, ValorDIAN )VALUES(10, (SUBSTRING(@NITFinal, 10, 1)),23) INSERT INTO @Specification(ID,Valor, ValorDIAN )VALUES(11, (SUBSTRING(@NITFinal, 11, 1)),19) INSERT INTO @Specification(ID,Valor, ValorDIAN )VALUES(12, (SUBSTRING(@NITFinal, 12, 1)),17) INSERT INTO @Specification(ID,Valor, ValorDIAN )VALUES(13, (SUBSTRING(@NITFinal, 13, 1)),13) INSERT INTO @Specification(ID,Valor, ValorDIAN )VALUES(14, (SUBSTRING(@NITFinal, 14, 1)),7) INSERT INTO @Specification(ID,Valor, ValorDIAN )VALUES(15, (SUBSTRING(@NITFinal, 15, 1)),3)
SET @Suma = (SELECT SUM(Valor*ValorDIAN) FROM @Specification)
SET @Residuo = @Suma%11
IF (@Residuo <= 1) BEGIN SET @DigitoVerificacionHallado = 1 END ELSE BEGIN SET @DigitoVerificacionHallado = 11 - @Residuo END
return @DigitoVerificacionHallado end
return 99 END
Queries.Eliminar_BO_FacturaXML: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE type = 'P' AND name = '%sNameProcedure%') BEGIN DROP PROCEDURE %sNameProcedure% END
